name: A Tale From The Ocean - Puzzle Game
name_original: A Tale From The Ocean - Puzzle Game
description:
Pitch

In the ocean blocks can only be moved  sideways and fall from above. Move the blocks, get combos, points and active special blocks to active unique tile removals.

Complete each level, get new blocks, simple!

Gameplay

Simply use the mouse, and click to swap blocks around, when blocks are swapped combos may be achieved.

Combos are blocks of matching types that align vertically or horizontally, three blocks and over. The larger the combo the better.

During play your performance is measured, each level requires an increasing number of points to complete, new blocks are introduced at different levels. These pieces bring new mechanics to the game and will remove blocks around it in a certain pattern. They cannot be swapped but will activate their ability on click.
